content.description: The writer wants the underlined portion of sentence 15 (reproduced below) to be stylistically consistent with the passage overall.
content.question: More importantly, they should get the low down from a trusted physician.Which version of the underlined text best achieves this goal?

skill.text: Skill 8.A: Strategically use words, comparisons, and syntax to convey a specific tone or style in an argument.
